message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $110. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to go up to $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going as low as $105. I'll counter with $115. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll sell the product to you. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
